dialog.home.title: Welcome to the Pack Editor!
dialog.home.body: Voxel Studio is designed for everyone. No coding or development knowledge required. Simply edit existing game content to create your perfect experience.
dialog.home.list.1: Intuitive interface accessible to all players.
dialog.home.list.2: Modify vanilla content without writing code.
dialog.overview.title: Overview Pages
dialog.overview.body: Overview pages let you browse and navigate between elements quickly. Switch from one element to another with ease across all concepts.
dialog.overview.list.1: Grid and list views to suit your preference.
dialog.overview.list.2: Search bar to quickly find any element.
dialog.overview.list.3: Quick options to filter and sort content.
dialog.edit.title: Configure Elements
dialog.edit.body: Click 'Configure' from any overview to access detailed editing pages. Adjust game design, tweak balance, or disable elements entirely.
dialog.edit.list.1: Fine-tune game balance with intuitive controls.
dialog.edit.list.2: Easily enable or disable specific elements.
dialog.simulation.title: Simulation Mode
dialog.simulation.body: Some concepts offer simulation to preview how changes will look in-game. Get relevant stats and information in a clear, accessible format.
dialog.simulation.list.1: Preview your changes as they would appear in Minecraft.
dialog.debug.title: Debug Mode
dialog.debug.body: Enable debug mode in settings to access advanced information. Inspect file contents before and after modifications for full transparency.
dialog.debug.list.1: View raw file data and structure.
dialog.export.title: Export Your Work
dialog.export.body: Export your creations in multiple formats. Studio handles the conversion from datapack to mod automatically.
dialog.export.list.1: Export as .zip datapack for vanilla Minecraft.
dialog.export.list.2: Export as .jar mod ready for mod loaders.
dialog.export.list.3: GitHub integration for push and pull requests.
